data.name: ApplicationName_UserPortal
data.value: User Portal

data.name: Button_AuthenticateMeNow
data.value: Authenticate Me Now

data.name: Button_CallMeNowToAuthenticate
data.value: Call Me Now to Authenticate

data.name: Button_Next
data.value: Next

data.name: Button_TextMeNowToAuthenticate
data.value: Text Me Now to Authenticate

data.name: Button_VerifyOathToken
data.value: Verify OATH Token

data.name: Help_File
data.value: help/PhoneFactor_User_Portal.htm
data.comment: Localize as help/xx/PhoneFactor_User_Portal.htm where xx is langauge code (e.g. de for German, zh-hans for Simplified Chinese)

data.name: Label_AlternatePhoneOathToken
data.value: The Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app does not need to be connected to the mobile network or WiFi in order to display authentication codes.

data.name: Label_AlternatePhonePhoneApp
data.value: The Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app works equally well over WiFi.

data.name: Label_AlternatePhoneSms
data.value: You can change your account to point to an alternate phone number, by selecting the Change Phone Number option.

data.name: Label_AlternatePhoneVoice
data.value: You can change your account to point to an alternate phone number, such as a land line, by selecting the Change Phone Number option.

data.name: Label_CannotChangeModeToPhoneApp
data.value: After activating the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on your device, your account must have its method changed to Mobile App before you cant start using the app. Contact the help desk to change your method to Mobile App.

data.name: Label_Disable
data.value: Disable

data.name: Label_Enable
data.value: Enable

data.name: Label_FraudAlertPhoneApp
data.value: To report the incident, press the Deny and Report Fraud button in the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app. This will alert your company's IT security team. Future authentication attempts will be blocked until the issue has been resolved.

data.name: Label_FraudAlertSms
data.value: To report the incident, enter the fraud code in your reply. This will alert your company's IT security team. Future authentication attempts will be blocked until the issue has been resolved.

data.name: Label_FraudAlertVoice
data.value: To report the incident, select the Fraud Alert option from the phone menu during the authentication call. This will alert your company's IT security team. Future authentication attempts will be blocked until the issue has been resolved.

data.name: Label_GenerateActivationCode
data.value: Generate Activation Code

data.name: Label_GenerateActivationLink
data.value: Generate Activation Link

data.name: Label_GenerateNewActivationCode
data.value: Generate New Activation Code

data.name: Label_GenerateNewActivationLink
data.value: Generate New Activation Link

data.name: Label_HowPhoneFactorWorksDescriptionOathToken
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication works by prompting for an authentication code during login.

data.name: Label_HowPhoneFactorWorksDescriptionPhoneApp
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication works by sending a notification to your Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app during login.

data.name: Label_HowPhoneFactorWorksDescriptionSms
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication works by sending a text message to your phone during login.

data.name: Label_HowPhoneFactorWorksDescriptionVoice
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication works by placing a confirmation call to your phone during login.

data.name: Label_InstructionsAdministrator
data.value: Manage user accounts by selecting Find Users from the menu. Manage your account by selecting the appropriate option. Select the Help Icon (top right) for assistance.

data.name: Label_InstructionsChangeModeOathToken
data.value: Select OATH Token method to authenticate using an authentication code from the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app.

data.name: Label_InstructionsChangeModePhoneApp
data.value: Select Mobile App method to authenticate using the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app.

data.name: Label_InstructionsChangeModeSmsText
data.value: Select Text Message method to receive a text message to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsChangeModeVoiceCall
data.value: Select Phone Call method to receive a phone call to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsEnterOtp
data.value: To complete your verification, enter the one-time passcode you receive via text message.

data.name: Label_InstructionsEnterOtpPlusPin
data.value: To complete your verification, enter the one-time passcode you receive via text message plus your PIN.

data.name: Label_InstructionsFindUser
data.value: Enter the first few characters of the username and click the Find button.

data.name: Label_InstructionsOathToken
data.value: Test this user's OATH token authentication.

data.name: Label_InstructionsPhoneApp
data.value: Test this user's mobile app authentication.

data.name: Label_InstructionsPhoneAuthenticationIpWhitelist
data.value: After activation is complete, click Next to continue the setup process.

data.name: Label_InstructionsPhoneAuthenticationOathToken
data.value: After activation is complete, click the following button to test authentication and continue the setup process. When prompted, enter the current authentication code displayed in the mobile app.

data.name: Label_InstructionsSelectUser
data.value: Select a user from the list or select Back to find a different user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsSmsText
data.value: Test this user's text message authentication.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUnblockUser
data.value: Enter an unblock reason and confirm unblocking the user. The user will no longer have authentications blocked.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserActivatePhoneApp
data.value: The user must first install the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on their phone. Click the Generate button to receive an activation code. The activation code will be entered in the user's mobile app to complete the activation process.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserDeactivatePhoneApp
data.value: To deactivate a device for the user, click the Deactivate link for the device.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserEnable
data.value: Confirm enabling the user so that they will begin receiving Multi-Factor Authentication calls when signing on.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserInformation
data.value: Specify new information for this user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserLanguage
data.value: Specify the language preference for this user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserMode
data.value: Select the method for this user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserOathCode
data.value: To complete the authentication, enter the current authentication code displayed in the user's Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app or token.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserOathToken
data.value: Enter the OATH token serial number and the code currently displayed on the token to associate the token with the user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserOneTimeBypass
data.value: Confirm one-time bypass to skip Multi-Factor Authentication during this user's next sign on. The bypass is temporary.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserOtp
data.value: To complete the authentication, enter the one-time passcode the user received in the SMS message.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserOtpPlusPin
data.value: To complete the authentication, enter the one-time passcode the user received in the SMS message plus the user's PIN.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserPhone
data.value: Specify a new phone number for this user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserPin
data.value: Specify a new PIN number for this user.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserResetVoiceprint
data.value: Confirm reset of the user's voiceprint. The user will have to enroll a new voiceprint during their next authentication call.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupOathToken
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account using the OATH Token method, enter the serial number printed on the back of the OATH token and the code currently displayed on the token to associate the token with your account.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupOathTokenPhoneApp
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account using the OATH Token method, you'll first need to install the Multi-Factor Authentication app on your phone and then click the Generate button below to receive an activation code. The activation code will be entered in the mobile app to complete the activation process. The activation code expires in 10 minutes.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupPhoneApp
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account using the mobile app, you'll first need to install the Multi-Factor Authentication app on your phone and then click the Generate button below to receive an activation code. The activation code will be entered in the mobile app to complete the activation process. The activation code expires in 10 minutes.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupPin
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate and a PIN.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupSmsOneWayOtp
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupSmsOneWayOtpPlusPin
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate and a PIN.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupSmsTwoWayOtp
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupSmsTwoWayOtpPlusPin
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate and a PIN.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupStandard
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteOathToken
data.value: Follow the instructions below to activate the Multi-Factor Authentication app on your phone and test an authentication using authentication codes provided by the mobile app.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompletePhoneApp
data.value: Follow the instructions below to activate the Multi-Factor Authentication app on your phone and test an authentication using the mobile app.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompletePin
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will call the number you entered. Enter your PIN followed by # to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteSmsOneWayOtp
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will send a one-time passcode in a text message to the number you entered. When prompted, enter the one-time passcode to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteSmsOneWayOtpPlusPin
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will send a one-time passcode in a text message to the number you entered. When prompted, enter the one-time passcode plus your PIN to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteSmsTwoWayOtp
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will send a one-time passcode in a text message to the number you entered. Reply to the text message with the one-time passcode to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteSmsTwoWayOtpPlusPin
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will send a one-time passcode in a text message to the number you entered. Reply to the text message with the one-time passcode plus your PIN to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteStandard
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will call the number you entered. Answer and press # to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupToCompleteVoiceprint
data.value: To complete this step, Multi-Factor Authentication will call the number you entered. Follow the instructions to enroll a voiceprint passphrase.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserSetupVoiceprint
data.value: To enable Multi-Factor Authentication for your account, please specify the phone number you will use to authenticate.

data.name: Label_InstructionsUserStaticToken
data.value: Specify a new static token for this user.

data.name: Label_MessageOathToken
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will be prompted by the application to enter the current authentication code from the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app or token to complete your sign on. If you don't enter the correct authentication code, the sign on will be denied.

data.name: Label_MessagePhoneAppPin
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a notification asking you to launch the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app and enter your PIN to confirm your sign on. If you don't confirm the sign on by entering your PIN and pressing #, the sign on will be denied.

You should only enter your PIN when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your PIN.

data.name: Label_MessagePhoneAppStandard
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a notification asking you to launch the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app and press the Authenticate button to complete your sign on. If you don't confirm the sign on by pressing Authenticate, the sign on will be denied.

You should only press the Authenticate button when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

data.name: Label_MessagePhoneAppVoiceprint
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a notification asking you to launch the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app and then say your passphrase to confirm your sign on. If you don't confirm the sign on by saying your passphrase, the sign on will be denied.

You should only say your passphrase when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

data.name: Label_MessagePin
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a phone call asking you to enter your PIN followed by the pound (#) key to confirm your sign on. If you don't confirm the sign on by entering your PIN and pressing #, the sign on will be denied.

You should only enter your PIN when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication call if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number or PIN.

data.name: Label_MessageSmsOneWayOtp
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Enter this passcode when prompted by the application. If you don't enter the correct passcode, the sign on will be denied.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number.

data.name: Label_MessageSmsOneWayOtpPlusPin
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Enter this passcode and your PIN when prompted by the application. If you don't enter the correct passcode and PIN, the sign on will be denied.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number or PIN.

data.name: Label_MessageSmsTwoWayOtp
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Reply to the text message with this passcode. If you don't reply with the correct passcode, the sign on will be denied.

You should only reply when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication text message if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number.

data.name: Label_MessageSmsTwoWayOtpPlusPin
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Reply to the text message with this passcode and your PIN. If you don't reply with the correct passcode and PIN, the sign on will be denied.

You should only reply when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication text message if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number or PIN.

data.name: Label_MessageStandard
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a phone call asking you to press the pound (#) key to confirm your sign on. If you don't confirm the sign on by pressing #, the sign on will be denied.

You should only enter # when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication call if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number.

data.name: Label_MessageVoiceprint
data.value:
Your account has been configured to use Multi-Factor Authentication.

When you sign on, you will continue to use the same username and password. Before your verification is complete, you will receive a phone call asking you to say your passphrase to confirm your sign on. If you don't confirm the sign on by saying your passphrase, the sign on will be denied.

You should only say your passphrase when you receive the Multi-Factor Authentication call if you are actually signing on to the application. Otherwise, someone may be trying to sign on with your username and password and you should report this potential fraud to your IT administrator.

Return to the Multi-Factor Authentication portal at any time to change your phone number.

data.name: Label_MustChangeModeToPhoneApp
data.value: After activating the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on your device, you'll need to change your method to Mobile App. Click the Change Method link in the navigation menu and specify the Mobile App method to start using the app.

data.name: Label_MustChangeUserToPhoneAppMode
data.value: After the user activates the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on their device, you'll need to change their method to Mobile App in order for them to use the app.

data.name: Label_NotLoggingInAnswerPhoneApp
data.value: This would only happen if someone else were trying to log into your account, and they already knew your password. Remember, Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notifications are only sent after the username and password are verified. So, if this happens, Multi-Factor Authentication has just saved your account from illicit access!

data.name: Label_NotLoggingInAnswerSms
data.value: This would only happen if someone else were trying to log into your account, and they already knew your password. Remember, text messages are only sent after the username and password are verified. So, if this happens, Multi-Factor Authentication has just saved your account from illicit access!

data.name: Label_NotLoggingInAnswerVoice
data.value: This would only happen if someone else were trying to log into your account, and they already knew your password. Remember, phone calls are only made after the username and password are verified. So, if this happens, Multi-Factor Authentication has just saved your account from illicit access!

data.name: Label_NotLoggingInQuestionPhoneApp
data.value: What if I receive a Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification when I'm not trying to log in?

data.name: Label_NotLoggingInQuestionSms
data.value: What if I get a text message from Multi-Factor Authentication when I'm not trying to log in?

data.name: Label_NotLoggingInQuestionVoice
data.value: What if I get a phone call from Multi-Factor Authentication when I'm not trying to log in?

data.name: Label_OneTimeBypassOathToken
data.value: Also, your company provides a One-Time Bypass option which allows you to log in one time without being prompted for an authentication code. Select the One-Time Bypass option to access this feature. Or call the support help desk from any phone for assistance.

data.name: Label_OneTimeBypassPhoneApp
data.value: Also, your company provides a One-Time Bypass option which allows you to log in one time without a Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification. Select the One-Time Bypass option to access this feature. Or call the support help desk from any phone for assistance.

data.name: Label_OneTimeBypassSms
data.value: Your company provides a One-Time Bypass option which allows you to log in one time without a text message. Select the One-Time Bypass option to access this feature. Or call the support help desk from any phone for assistance.

data.name: Label_OneTimeBypassVoice
data.value: Your company provides a One-Time Bypass option which allows you to log in one time without a phone call. Select the One-Time Bypass option to access this feature. Or call the support help desk from any phone for assistance.

data.name: Label_OneTimePasscodeOtp
data.value: One-Time Passcode

data.name: Label_OneTimePasscodeOtpPlusPin
data.value: One-Time Passcode + PIN

data.name: Label_SimpleProcessOathToken
data.value: This simple process provides two separate factors of authentication with the secondary authentication provided by something you have (your smart phone or token).

data.name: Label_SimpleProcessPhoneApp
data.value: This simple process provides two separate factors of authentication through two separate channels (your computer and your smart phone).

data.name: Label_SimpleProcessSms
data.value: This simple process provides two separate factors of authentication through two separate channels (your computer and your phone service). It works with any phone with text message capabilities.

data.name: Label_SimpleProcessVoice
data.value: This simple process provides two separate factors of authentication through two separate channels (your computer and your phone service). It works with any regular or mobile phone.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionOathToken
data.value: Instantly, you are prompted for an authentication code. Enter the current authentication code displayed by the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app or token.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionPhoneAppPin
data.value: Instantly, you receive a Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification. Launch the app, enter your PIN, and press the Authenticate button.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionPhoneAppStandard
data.value: Instantly, you receive a Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification. Launch the app and press the Authenticate button.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionPhoneAppVoiceprint
data.value: Instantly, you receive a Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app notification. Launch the app and say your passphrase when prompted.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionPin
data.value: Instantly, you receive a phone call. Answer, enter your PIN, and press #.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionSmsOneWayOtp
data.value: Instantly, you receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Enter this passcode when prompted by the application.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionSmsOneWayOtpPlusPin
data.value: Instantly, you receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Enter this passcode and your PIN when prompted by the application.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionSmsTwoWayOtp
data.value: Instantly, you receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Reply to the text message with this passcode.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionSmsTwoWayOtpPlusPin
data.value: Instantly, you receive a text message with a one-time passcode. Reply to the text message with this passcode and your PIN.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionStandard
data.value: Instantly, you receive a phone call. Answer and press #.

data.name: Label_Step2DescriptionVoiceprint
data.value: Instantly, you receive a phone call. Answer and say your passphrase at the tone.

data.name: Label_UnblockReason
data.value: Unblock Reason

data.name: Message_AccountConfigurationComplete
data.value: Account Configuration Complete

data.name: Message_AnswerRequired
data.value: You must answer at least one security question.

data.name: Message_AnswerSecurityQuestions
data.value: Please answer your security questions to log on.

data.name: Message_AnswersIncorrect
data.value: One or more answers is incorrect.

data.name: Message_AuthenticationDenied
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication denied.

data.name: Message_AuthenticationDeniedAnswerSecurityQuestions
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication denied. Please answer your security questions to log on.

data.name: Message_AuthenticationDeniedCallResult
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication denied: {0}

data.name: Message_AuthenticationSuccessful
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication successful.

data.name: Message_BypassSecondsNumeric
data.value: Bypass Seconds must be numeric.

data.name: Message_BypassSecondsRange
data.value: Bypass Seconds must be between 5 and 1800 (30 minutes).

data.name: Message_BypassSecondsRequired
data.value: Bypass Seconds required.

data.name: Message_CannotActivateDevice
data.value: Your account must be associated with an activated Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on a device before you can change your method to Mobile App. Contact the help desk for assistance with activating the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on your device.

data.name: Message_CannotEstablishWebServiceSdkConnection
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication User Portal cannot establish a secure connection to the Web Service SDK: {0}

data.name: Message_CannotGetOathToken
data.value: Your account must be associated with an activated Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on a device or associated with an OATH token before you can change your method to OATH Token. Contact the help desk for assistance with activating the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on your device or getting an OATH token assigned.

data.name: Message_CannotSpecifyPhoneSmsText
data.value: Your account must have a phone number assigned before you can change your method to Text Message. Contact your help desk to assign a phone number to your account.

data.name: Message_CannotSpecifyPhoneVoiceCall
data.value: Your account must have a phone number assigned before you can change your method to Phone Call. Contact the help desk to assign a phone number to your account.

data.name: Message_ChangeModeOathTokenIncomplete
data.value: Note: The user has not activated the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on their device or been assigned a third-party OATH token and is considered incomplete for the OATH Token method. Authentications to protected applications will fail for this user and log ins to the User Portal will require them to enroll again. It is recommended that you either contact the user to assist them with activating the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app or assign and distribute a third-party OATH token.

data.name: Message_ChangeModePhoneAppIncomplete
data.value: Note: The user has not activated the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on their device and is considered incomplete for the Mobile App method. Authentications to protected applications will fail for this user and log ins to the User Portal will require them to enroll again. It is recommended that you contact the user to assist them with activating the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app.

data.name: Message_ChangeModeSmsTextIncomplete
data.value: Note: The user does not have a phone number specified and is considered incomplete for the Text Message method. Authentications to protected applications will fail for this user and log ins to the User Portal will require them to enroll again. It is recommended that you specify a phone number for the user so that they may continue to use protected applications without having to reenroll.

data.name: Message_ChangeModeVoiceCallIncomplete
data.value: Note: The user does not have a phone number specified and is considered incomplete for the Phone Call method. Authentications to protected applications will fail for this user and log ins to the User Portal will require them to enroll again. It is recommended that you specify a phone number for the user so that they may continue to use protected applications without having to reenroll.

data.name: Message_CodeRequired
data.value: Code required.

data.name: Message_CodeRequiredCross
data.value: Code required when serial number is specified.

data.name: Message_ConfirmDeactivate
data.value: Are you sure you want to permanently deactivate this device?

data.name: Message_DeviceDeactivated
data.value: Device deactivated.

data.name: Message_DeviceLimit
data.value: Your account is at the limit of {0} devices. You must deactivate an existing device before activating a new one.

data.name: Message_DuplicateAnswer
data.value: Duplicate answer not allowed.

data.name: Message_DuplicateQuestion
data.value: Duplicate question not allowed.

data.name: Message_DuplicateUsername
data.value: Duplicate username.

Error adding user for passed session.

data.name: Message_ErrorCommunicatingWithMaster
data.value: Error communicating with the master Multi-Factor Authentication service. Please contact your administrator.
data.comment: Most pages when connection to master server is lost

Error deactivating device.

data.name: Message_ExpiredSession
data.value: Your session has expired.

data.name: Message_IncorrectAnswers
data.value: The answers you provided are incorrect, please try again.

data.name: Message_IncorrectOathCode
data.value: Incorrect authentication code.

data.name: Message_IncorrectOneTimePasscode
data.value: Incorrect one-time passcode.

data.name: Message_IncorrectOneTimePasscodePlusPin
data.value: Incorrect one-time passcode + PIN.

data.name: Message_InvalidExtension
data.value: Invalid extension. Only digits, commas, *, and # are allowed. Use comma for a one second pause. Prefix the extension with @ to say extension digits for manual transfer.

data.name: Message_InvalidSerialNumber
data.value: Invalid serial number. The OATH Token with this serial number must be defined in the Multi-Factor Authentication Server user interface prior to associating it with a user.

data.name: Message_LineBreak
data.comment: add_user, change_phone, change_pin, change_mode, change_language and enable_disable pages

data.name: Message_LoginFailed
data.value: Login failed.

data.name: Message_MustActivateDevice
data.value: You must activate the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on a device before you can change your method to Mobile App. Click the Activate Mobile App link in the navigation menu to begin your activation.

data.name: Message_MustActivateDeviceOathToken
data.value: You must activate the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on a device before you can change your method to OATH Token. Click the Activate Mobile App link in the navigation menu to begin your activation.

data.name: Message_MustAnswerAllQuestions
data.value: You must answer all security questions.

data.name: Message_MustEnrollOathToken
data.value: You must associate an OATH token with your account before you can change your method to OATH Token. Click the OATH Token link to associate an OATH token.

data.name: Message_MustHaveOathToken
data.value: You must either activate the Multi-Factor Authentication mobile app on a device or associate an OATH token with your account before you can change your method to OATH Token. Click the Activate Mobile App link in the navigation menu to begin your activation or click the OATH Token link to associate an OATH token.

data.name: Message_MustSpecifyPhoneSmsText
data.value: You must specify a phone number for your account before you can change your method to Text Message. Click the Change Phone link in the navigation menu to specify a phone number.

data.name: Message_MustSpecifyPhoneVoiceCall
data.value: You must specify a phone number for your account before you can change your method to Phone Call. Click the Change Phone link in the navigation menu to specify a phone number.

data.name: Message_MustSpecifySearchField
data.value: Must specify at least one search field.

data.name: Message_NoActivatedDevices
data.value: No activated devices for this user.

data.name: Message_NoMatchingUsersFound
data.value: No matching users found.

data.name: Message_NoSsl
data.value: Multi-Factor Authentication User Portal is not secured with SSL, but SSL is required for session cookies in Web.config. User Portal is not functional since session state can't be maintained. It is recommended that User Portal be secured with SSL. For testing purposes, you may temporarily change requireSSL to "false" in the <httpCookies> tag in Web.config.

data.name: Message_OathTokenSynchronizationFailed
data.value: OATH token synchronization failed. Either the code entered is not correct or the OATH token serial number is not valid.

data.name: Message_OathTokenSynchronizationFailedUser
data.value: OATH token synchronization failed. The code entered is not correct.

data.name: Message_OnlyFirstMatchesDisplayed
data.value: Only the first {0} matches are displayed. If you can't find the user in the list, enter more specific search criteria.

data.name: Message_PassedSessionFailed
data.value: Passed session failed.

data.name: Message_PhoneRequired
data.value: Phone required.

data.name: Message_PinMatch
data.value: PIN and Confirm PIN must match.

data.name: Message_PinMinimumLength
data.value: PIN must be at least {0} digits.

data.name: Message_PinNumeric
data.value: PIN must be numeric.

data.name: Message_PinRecentlyUsed
data.value: PIN cannot be the same as one of your recently used PINs. Please choose a different PIN.

data.name: Message_SamlDisabled
data.value: Single sign-ons to external applications using SAML are disabled.

data.name: Message_SecurityQuestionsNotDefined
data.value: Security questions are not defined for this user.

data.name: Message_SecurityQuestionsNotSetUp
data.value: You may not log in without your phone since you have not set up security questions.

data.name: Message_SecurityQuestionsVerified
data.value: Security questions verified.

data.name: Message_SecurityWarningNoSsl
data.value: SECURITY WARNING: Multi-Factor Authentication User Portal is not secured with SSL. Passwords will be passed in plain text.

data.name: Message_SerialNumberAlreadyAssociated
data.value: Serial number already associated with {0}. You must remove the serial number from that user before associating it with this user.

data.name: Message_SerialNumberRequired
data.value: Serial number required.

data.name: Message_SerialNumberRequiredCross
data.value: Serial Number required when code is specified.

data.name: Message_ShortAnswer
data.value: Answer must be at least 4 characters.

data.name: Message_StaticTokenMatch
data.value: Static Token and Confirm Static Token must match.

data.name: Message_StaticTokenMinimumLength
data.value: Static Token must be at least {0} digits.

data.name: Message_StaticTokenNumeric
data.value: Static Token must be numeric.

data.value: Block failed. The user is already blocked.

data.value: The user was successfully blocked.

data.name: Message_UserBlockFailed
data.value: Block failed.

data.value: Weak Static Token not allowed. Cannot contain a 4 or more digit subset of the phone number, 3 or more repeating digits, or 3 or more sequential digits.
